headerDisplay: This plugin works with Denon/Marantz AV Receivers series X and are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired. 1. Open the Home app on your device. 2. Tap the Home tab, then tap . 3. Tap *Add Accessory*, and select *I Don't Have a Code or Cannot Scan*. 4. Enter the Homebridge PIN, this can be found under the QR code in Homebridge UI or your Homebridge logs, alternatively you can select *Use Camera* and scan the QR code again.
footerDisplay: This plugin works with Denon/Marantz AV Receivers series X which is available [here](https://github.com/grzegorz914/homebridge-denon-tv).

zoneControl.title: Zone Control
zoneControl.description: Here select which Zone You want control.

volumeControl.title: Volume Control Mode
volumeControl.description: Here select what a volume control mode You want to use. If select *None* only hardware buttons in RC app can be used to control volume.

masterPower.title: Master Power Control
masterPower.description: The power switch for that zone will turn the entire receiver `ON` or `OFF/STANDBY` rather than just the zone itself.

masterVolume.title: Master Volume Control
masterVolume.description: The volume for that zone will set the entire receiver volume `UP` or `DOWN` rather than just the zone itself.

masterMute.title: Master Mute Control
masterMute.description: The mute switch for that zone will muted the entire receiver `ON` or `OFF` rather than just the zone itself.

switchInfoMenu.title: Switch Info/Menu
switchInfoMenu.description: This toggle behaviour for *I* button in RC app and *PowerModeSELECTion* in settings.

disableLogInfo.title: Disable log info
disableLogInfo.description: This disable log info, all values and state will not be displayed in Homebridge log console.

oneOf.title: REFERENCE LEVEL OFFSET (0dB) FOR DYNAMIC EQ
REFERENCE LEVEL OFFSET (5dB) FOR DYNAMIC EQ
REFERENCE LEVEL OFFSET (10dB) FOR DYNAMIC EQ
REFERENCE LEVEL OFFSET (15dB) FOR DYNAMIC EQ
